title: DROP MATERIALIZED VIEW | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Materialized views require Enterprise Edition. To inquire about upgrading, please contact Snowflake Support.
Removes the specified materialized view from the current/specified schema.
ALTER MATERIALIZED VIEW , CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW , SHOW MATERIALIZED VIEWS , DESCRIBE MATERIALIZED VIEW

Dropping a materialized view does not update references to that view. For example, if you create a view named “V1” on top of a
materialized view, and then you drop the materialized view, the definition of view “V1” will become out of date.
Dropped materialized views cannot be recovered; they must be recreated.
